column2: Direct the PSC to revoke the order made on 19.10.2020 sending the
appellant on compulsory leave and allow her to resume duties in the
post of Solicitor General with immediate effect,
Retire the appellant on 30.07.2021 on her reaching compulsory age
Take  steps  to  conclude  the  formal  disciplinary  inquiry  against  the

appellant 
in 
terms  of  P.A.  Circular  30/2019  dated  30.09.2019
